criterion: Provides a SOAP note that does not include a patient's chief complaint.
Mistakenly suggests that the patient's ADHD is a developmental disorder.
Asks the user for additional information about the patient's symptoms before generating the SOAP note.
The SOAP note includes a clear and concise summary of the patient's chief complaint, medical history, and plan.
The SOAP note does not include the patient's validated ADHD questionnaire results.
Mistakenly recommends a different medication or dosage for the patient's ADHD.
The SOAP note does not include a clear plan for the patient's follow-up appointment.
The SOAP note includes a detailed description of the patient's cognitive behavioral therapy plan.
The SOAP note does not include any information about the patient's unstructured text complaint.
